channel.title: How to connect Zapier to the Blockchain
channel.description:
MESG-Z is an app connecting Zapier to MESG with a two-way communication channel.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/use-case-connecting-zapier-mesg/
